ValidationRule.description: Checks if start date is future date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Program', ISPICKVAL( Product_Request__r.Product_Request_Status__c , 'Design'), OR( hed__Start_Date__c < TODAY(), hed__Start_Date__c == TODAY()) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Start Date must be a Future Date
